name: TAG2
description:
Thrall Automated Gathering (TAG) is a mod designed to automate the process of collecting resources. While your thralls spend all their time standing around, now they can be useful while you're AFK. Using the new feats (Search for TAG in your feats list) provided to unlock the recipes.

Join the discord to get more information, or get help troubleshooting what's wrong if you're experiencing any issues:
https://discord.gg/qRqfDmArkm

Basic Instructions:
1. Unlock the TAG feat in your feat's menu
2. Craft a TAG token (some tokens are craftable in your personal inventory, others are in the torturer's workbench)
3. Put down a container for your thrall to gather to - this can be a chest, box, crafting bench, or just about anything else that has an inventory (excluding yourself or followers)
4. put a thrall inside the bench
5. put the TAG Token right after the thrall (you will have to use 'custom' sorting)
6. Optionally, put a tool after the token
7. wait and profit!

Configuration has been added! use the following commands (must be admin) to change the rates so your server feels more at home:
DataCmd TAG_Rate [float]
DataCmd TAG_Time [float]
[more to come with fiture updates - check here fto see them!]

https://github.com/dracahn/CE-ThrallAutomatedGathering


Future Features:
1. [strike]Configurable rates/times for gathering[strike]
2. blackout times (configurable)
3. Tool Degredation (configurable)
4. Risk of Thrall Death/failure (configurable)
5. Add configuration to Token Scaling.  E.G. T1 tokens take 10 minutes, T2 take 20, and T3 take 30.  Allow a user to make that T1 = 10, T2 = 15 and T3 = 20.
